advancement.eclipticseasons.autumn_pumpk: 是派，不是π(获得秋季心髓)
advancement.eclipticseasons.spring_bread: 辛苦之后，来饱餐一顿吧~(获得春季心髓)
advancement.eclipticseasons.summer_harve: 炎炎夏天，西瓜清凉(获得夏季心髓)
advancement.eclipticseasons.summer_start: 盛夏可以准备吃西瓜了~
advancement.eclipticseasons.winter_campf: 雪夜，暖火，与我(获得冬季心髓)
advancement.eclipticseasons.humidity_con: 使用加湿器与除湿器以控制环境湿度
